body:
Comment 3: 
Yes,

fmt.Println(filepath.Join("\\", "test1", "test2"))

should print \test1\test2, not \\test1\test2.

and similar

fmt.Println(filepath.Join("/", "test1", "test2"))

should print \test1\test2, not \\test1\test2.

Alex
_Labels changed: added **os-windows**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
